definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)

sentences.english: Just go out in the rain, bank of waving, and stole some empty heart.
sentences.chinese: 刚才出门去银行，雨还在丝丝缕缕的飘着，心有些空。

sentences.english: Draw a lengthwise grain line in the center of each side panel.
sentences.chinese: 在每一侧片的中心画一条纵向丝缕线。

sentences.english: But the leaf is rather little heart in but many in nice threads continuously acid puckery.
sentences.chinese: 而叶少宁心中却多了丝丝缕缕的酸涩。

sentences.english: All birds that fly have round their leg the thread of the infinite.
sentences.chinese: 任何飞鸟的爪子都被无极的丝缕所牵。

sentences.english: Center front and center back grains need not necessarily be identical.
sentences.chinese: 前中与后中的丝缕不需要保持一致。

sentences.english: Leisurely years of silk thread, whether good or bad, cherish silently.
sentences.chinese: 悠然岁月的丝缕，无论好坏，默默珍惜。

sentences.english: And humans will be ever more intricately linked with their environment.
sentences.chinese: 人类与环境的联系会更加丝丝缕缕，纠缠不清。

sentences.english: Only gives fully in prose of filar detailed sorrow to affect my nerve.
sentences.chinese: 只有散文中透出的丝缕哀愁才能牵动我的神经。

sentences.english: It was composed of threads of iron and conveyed a cozy feeling as a bird's nest.
sentences.chinese: 它由丝缕般的钢铁组成，就像鸟儿的家一样温馨。

definition: strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
fine black hair/dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)
(of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
